data: Progressive experience career in Software development, specializing in Java/JEE, DevOps/Agile implementation and Technical Design.
Exposed to various architectural patterns like Backends for Frontend, Circuit Breaker, Publisher-Subscriber, Retry, Timeout and Bulk Head.
Well-versed in architecting Micro Services as well as transitioning monolithic applications to Micro Services architecture, with hands on experience in working on cloud solutions using PCF.
Enthusiastic programmer with exposure to TDD, Reactive Programming, Extreme Programming, Software Craftsmanship & Functional Programming
Experience with transitioning projects from traditional Waterfall to Agile methodology
Experience  with transitioning projects from Azure to GCP cloud migrations.
